sentence.Network_en: The boss retains enormous influence by reason of his position.
sentence.Network_cn: 老板由于自身的地位而一直有极大的影响力。

sentence.Network_en: As the boss began to rant, I stood up and went out.
sentence.Network_cn: 老板开始咆哮的时候，我起身走了出去。

sentence.Network_en: Three cannabis plants were found by eagle-eyed police officers.
sentence.Network_cn: 火眼金睛的警官发现了3株大麻。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(B) ... boss 老板 boss-eyed 斜眼的 bossdom 势力范围.
石油英语4-时间飞了-搜狐博客 ... boss ||老板, 上司指挥 boss-eyed ||斜眼的, 单眼的, 乖僻的 bossa nova ||波萨诺沃舞.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: compare with dialect boss 'miss, bungle', of unknown origin
